name: Classdy
description: A modern, offline-first PWA to help students manage their academic life. It features attendance tracking, schedule management, performance analytics, and a helpful chat assistant.
prompt: Create a student assistant PWA named Classdy. It should help users track their class attendance, manage schedules, and view analytics on their punctuality. The app must be fully responsive, work 100% offline, and include a rule-based chat assistant for answering questions about the user's schedule. The UI should be clean, modern, and intuitive.
